system.effect:
Character adds a value equal to that of their Size Trait to their Strength and Toughness Bonus for determining the amount they can Lift, Carry, or Push Heavy Objects.
They also gain +20 to Toughness Tests to avoid gaining Fatigue from Forced Marching.
Ratlings are Scrawny, Size 3. Humans are Average, Size 4. Ogryns are Hulking, Size 5.
